cause.description:
Zindagi Trust works against child labor & illiteracy in Pakistan by providing stipends for working children to go to school. ZT also empowers women by making high schools & health clinics for them.
Thank you for supporting Zindagi Trust. With your generous support we will be able to help many of our children and their families not only to meet essential daily needs, but to work toward a brighter future with programs in education and job training.
1. To establish a high quality vocational training program for working children of Pakistan.
2. To continue to provide formal education for working children enrolled in Trust’s program.
3. o make a significant contribution in the social development of the working children and their families by providing them a more meaningful and tangible vocational skills and knowledge.
4. To create an institution known for its commitment to the cause and providing a platform for employees and stakeholders to excel in their mission.
cause.mission: be a leader in providing opportunities to a better life through education to the underprivileged working children of Pakistan.
cause.name: Zindagi Trust
